abstract: The chip maker, a closely watched indicator of the overall health of the technology industry, reported net income of $1.3 billion, on revenue of $8.7 billion in the second quarter.
snippet: The chip maker, a closely watched indicator of the overall health of the technology industry, reported net income of $1.3 billion, on revenue of $8.7 billion in the second quarter.
lead_paragraph: Intel, the largest chip maker, said yesterday that strong demand for personal computers helped account for a 44 percent rise in profit during the second quarter, generally bolstering confidence that the company’s overhaul was paying off.

headline.main: Intel Earnings Rise 44%, but Shares Fall
headline.print_headline: Intel Earnings Rise 44%, but Shares Fall

abstract: Intel fights AMD by cutting prices. It will boost margins by bailing out of some flash chips.
snippet: Intel fights AMD by cutting prices. It will boost margins by bailing out of some flash chips.
lead_paragraph: If you watch Intel, it always seems to be tacking like a sailboat: adding product lines, getting out of product lines, raising prices to boost margin, lower prices to build market share.
